New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 7th triple of the season with a ball speed of 112.7 mph.
Ben Joyce recorded the fastest pitch to strike out a batter at 105.5 mph.
Key Match Events: Walker Buehler allowed a solo home run to Logan O'Hoppe in the 2nd inning.
Shohei Ohtani hit a game-tying triple in the 3rd inning.
Mookie Betts hit a go-ahead single in the 3rd inning.
Taylor Ward hit a solo home run in the 5th inning to tie the game.
Miguel Rojas hit a go-ahead single in the 10th inning.
Mookie Betts hit a 3-run home run in the 10th inning to secure the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Shohei Ohtani was welcomed back to Angel Stadium with a tribute on the screen highlighting his achievements with the Angels.
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers increased their season-high win margin to 29 games.
